to spend the winter
Ukiirut kisimiŋ.

winter skin

all winter, this winter, this year

winter, year

all winter, this winter, this year

to believe

adze

beard

to quote
Aanani uqaqtitaġaa.

penis

wart

pattern, measurement

to be alive (of an animal or plant)

this one [e.g. box, chair, confined area or person who is aware of activity around him not in motion, visible]
Uumani aquppiutami aquppigisiruŋa.I will sit in this chair.

to become angry
Uumitchaktuq aŋuyakmatni.

to become angry at someone or something

to be annoying
